mapper.select:
SELECT money_type, money_where, CASE WHEN money_in <> 0 THEN CONCAT('+', money_in) WHEN money_out <> 0 THEN CONCAT('-', money_out) ELSE NULL END AS money
FROM `user` u INNER JOIN money m ON u.user_idx = m.user_idx WHERE u.user_idx = #{user_idx} AND YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(m.money_when, '%Y-%m-%d')) = #{year} AND MONTH(STR_TO_DATE(m.money_when, '%Y-%m-%d')) = #{month} AND DAY(STR_TO_DATE(m.money_when, '%Y-%m-%d')) = #{day} AND (money_in <> 0 OR money_out <> 0)
mapper.insert: insert into `money` ( user_idx, money_when, money_type, money_where, money_in, money_out, created_date ) values ( #{user_idx}, #{money_when}, #{money_type}, #{money_where}, #{money_in}, #{money_out}, SYSDATE() )
